subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
In July 2009 UNDP Kosovo signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with the Kosovo Ministry of Environment and Spatial Planning (MESP) identifying following areas for mutual cooperation:
1) Climate change and renewable energy, 
2) Water governance, 
3) Biodiversity strategy and action plan, and 
4) Industrial  Pollution and Contamination Management. 

The main objectives of the Project are listed as follows:
i) In coordination with MESP establish mechanisms for development of a coherent and comprehensive environment agenda.
ii) Conduct public awareness activities highlighting environmental issues as a major agenda in Kosovo.
iii) Initiation of at least one regional cooperation project related to environment and climate change.
subproject.title: Support for MESP For Env. and

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
